pattern.applicability: Hugin NET Bayesian network model example
pattern.author: Matt Barry
pattern.consequences: Rework of argument structure and probability tables
pattern.implementation: Use Hugin DSL editor for structure, Network Analysis View for analysis
pattern.intent: Demonstrate basic structure of BN for evidence inference
pattern.motivation: Initialize the NET DSL editor with working content, editable to suit safety case evidence structure.
pattern.name: RTOS Software Analysis
